data.comment: The big names in today's match at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Jeremy Simpson, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 41, Sean Morrison (Cardiff) gets a yellow card.
Jeremy Simpson blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 51, Kyle McFadzean (Coventry) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Coventry have got their heads in front thanks to a Tyler Walker strike.
The away team have replaced Junior Hoilett with Sheyi Ojo. This is the first substitution made today by Neil Harris.
In the minute 59, Cardiff make their second substitution with Robert Glatzel replacing Josh Murphy.
Will Vaulks is replacing Marlon Pack for the away team.
The home team replace Gustavo Hamer with Callum O`Hare.
In the minute 85, Harry Wilson (Cardiff) has received a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Leo Ostigard is on a sub for Jordan Shipley for Coventry.
Ben Wilson is replacing Marko Marosi for the home team.
Mark Harris is on a sub for Joe Ralls for Cardiff.
